START.name: front of the cave
START.desc: you are standing in front of  a cave that is barely lit

ICAVE1.name: inside the cave
ICAVE1.desc: You are now inside the cave, there are random boxes and items scattered across the floor, and two exits leading right and left.

ROOMR.name: right room
ROOMR.desc: you are now in another room with more random boxes

ROOML.name: hall way
ROOML.desc: you are now looking at a hall  with two rooms to the left and one on the right
